Reviews.Author: Doug
Reviews.Content: Seriously, WTF??? If you have a store in the heart of Las Vegas, right off the strip, why in the hell would you be closed on Sunday???? Gee I guess they are doing so good they don't need customers during the weekend, oh well, I had a load of money to burn in there and it will just go someplace else.

Reviews.Author: Amelinda
Reviews.Content: This is probably the best toy store I've been - there is a large range of toys, however, it seems geared more toward adults and older children.  There are a lot of collectibles in locked cases and the best part, the huge wall of Funko Pop vinyl figures! These are adorable vinyl figures of popular television, movie, and real life characters that have been shrunk down and paired with disproportionally large heads. Prior to The Toy Box, I would purchase these vinyl figures on Amazon (if available). Although most of the prices are higher compared to Amazon, it's nice to see them in person and there are many figures that are hard to find online. They seem to range in price depending on their popularity, but they start around $10.  They have a nice Yelp check-in offer of 15% off one item, so don't forget to utilize it!

Reviews.Author: Mirta
Reviews.Content: My husband and I have come into this toy several times over the past year to buy toys for my son for birthdays and Christmas. I was in the mall with my son and daughter and popped in to let my son choose a toy. He likes those Crazy Aaron putties and found one that he didn't yet have. I paid for it walked out the store and around the corner and sat on a bench to look for something in my purse and my son took the putty out of the bag to look at his new purchase. It looked like the box had been previously opened. This putty comes with a black light which wasn't working. On closer inspection I noticed the tin was dented on the top and bottom. Obviously the tin had been opened and someone had played with it. I walked right back into the store and asked to exchange it for an unopened putty. The girl refused saying they can't exchange open items. This was literally 5 minutes later. I argued that I had not opened the toy, showed her the dents in the tin and that the black light did not work. She would not budge. 21 bucks down the toilet. She had to know we didn't open the tin, drop it a few times, and burn out the black light in less than 5 minutes. Call your manager. Take my number. Don't give me a flat  no ! I am now a costumer that will go somewhere else when I need stocking stuffers.  I am updating my review and rating because the store owner got in touch with me via Yelp and asked me to come back and he would exchange the putty.  Thank you!! I really like this shop and will return. I do not wish for the young lady to get in trouble, she just needs some common sense.

Reviews.Author: Chris
Reviews.Content: THIS IS A VERY COOL STORE!!!  We wanted some place with a different variety for my little girl's 5th birthday.  This place had a huge selection for all ages (including the vast selection of collectibles for adult super geeks).  I felt the prices were reasonable for a specialty store and the selection way better than your average Target toy section for the age group we were shopping for.  Tons of cool games and plush toys too.  It definitely feel like this store is quickly outgrowing its space.  Much of it felt disorganized and packed in.  I hope they find the bigger space and add to their great selection.  Toy stores like this are sorely missed among the landscape of homogenous big box stores that clutter the world.  Definitely worth checking out.

Reviews.Author: James
Reviews.Content: This is a really cool place.  Geeky cool.  In a small space, this place contains more than you'd imagine it could.  There's an assortment of lots of the popular toys and games in there, some cheaper things, and some fairly high-end toys and collectibles.  It's easy to go in and get lost browsing for longer than you intended your visit to last.   Games:  the selection of board games is incredible.  Most of the popular ones are there, many contemporary games and variations on older originals, but also some of the old standards.  There are also bunches of card games.  If you already have all the games you want, there's a good chance you'll find expansion packs for them here.  Figures:  It seems they have every POP figure in stock.  There's literally a whole wall of them!  Across from that wall, the other side of the isle is a cool assortment of less expensive figures from a decent variety of movies and video games.  In the back corner of the store you'll find a case with high-end collectible figures from various comic books, TV shows and movies.  Along that same back wall, but closer to the register, there are also more high-end figures sandwiched between the POPs and a decent assortment of LEGO sets.  There are quite a few figures in the store that we only see online.  Probably too custom or niche for the larger toy stores to carry, but Toy Box seems to have them.  Ships:  If you're a fan of classic Science Fiction, there are a reasonable number of ships (and other prop replicas) available.  Look on top of the shelves in the middle of the store or you might miss them though.  Stuffed Animals:  they have them.  If you have a child who can't resist them, you've been warned.  Other novelties:  there are cases and shelves with all sorts of inexpensive toy figurines and characters, coffee mugs, toy swords and other implements from all current kid's shows.  Because this isn't your gigantic toy store, be ready to pay a little more for many of the items you come across, but remember, there's quite a bit in here that you won't find readily available at other toy stores.  If you want to put your eyes and hands on some of these gems rather than depending on images posted on your favorite Internet shopping site, you need to swing by.  Now it's time for you to go in and browse.  Just give yourself more time than you think you'll spend there, be prepared to walk out with something you didn't intend to buy, then walk next door to CREAM and continue reliving your childhood with a hand-made ice cream sandwich!  One recommendation:  Toy Box, please set up customer WiFi.  The cellular coverage seems to go from barely there to nonexistent once you walk through the door.  I, for one, would be a happier customer when I have the ability to text pics of the cool stuff I see to my geek friends without waiting until I leave the store.

Reviews.Author: Michaelangelo
Reviews.Content: -Awesome pop collection. Best I've seen in Las Vegas.  -it seems to have a little bit of everything with that said.. The store is too small. Too many stacks of random toys laying around. Boxes are getting ruined and it seems unorganized at times. Aisles are thin. Not stroller friendly.   -it's also a tad bit pricey.  -I love this place though, mainly cuz I have a pop addiction and if you're looking for a great pop store, this is it.   -This store and cream are really the only 2 places I care about in downtown summerlin.

Reviews.Author: Janmark
Reviews.Content: CONS: I usually come to this store to check up on the Pop! figures and honestly this place overprices the most common pops and the place the price tag in the worst spot possible. As a Funko Pop! collector, most pops that have a sticker on the plastic portion of the box are difficult to remove and they leave marks on the box. This does not including stickers that state exclusive on them. If you buy pops from this place, you're either desperate or don't know where to get pops for a cheaper price. Also, I do check here frequently on their posters and when I do check on them, it's like they never restock them. When you go through the other aisles they are really unorganized. There will be damaged products all the way at front, and the good products are under an entire stack of other toys. It's like playing Jenga except you always knock the tower down.  PROS: Although their pops are overpriced, they do have a great collection on their wall. If I do need a Pop! I know exactly where to find it. Surprisingly their collection is pretty organized too. All disney pops are grouped together, DC universe pops are together etc. Another pro about this store is their displays. I love looking at their display cases and check out the statues and exclusive figures.

Reviews.Author: Nelson
Reviews.Content: YELP 365 CHALLENGE 2014-(364/365)  Toys For The Uber Geek!   This is a cool little toy shop among many scattered around town. Not really your standard set up like Toys R Us, The Toy Box is sorta geared toward collectors, while at the same time offering board games, Legos, stuffed animals, and learning toys for children as well...kinda like a mash up between Rogue Toys and Kappa Toys.  Highly collectible items are inside the glass cases and tons of other action figures fill a few aisles. If you're a fan of those POP! vinyl figures, they have an entire wall designated for them. Up front and high above, you can shell out the big bucks for a Star Wars Master Replicas Lightsaber, and even for you Christmas Story fans, they have the  Leg Lamp  which could be yours for $205!  Stop in here for a trip down your childhood memory lane! ALOHA!!!  Shaka Meter: \uuu/  \uuu/  \uuu/  \uuu/  4

Reviews.Author: Max
Reviews.Content: If you don't mind spending extra cash on toys you can find for cheaper else where, well there you have it. It's an okay store just overpriced but it's reasonable because of its location. Despite that, the workers here are very nice and helpful and this is the best part of this store.

Reviews.Author: Elizabeth
Reviews.Content: This store has some amazing things for sale! Perfect store for people who buy collectables. The only thing I would recommend is for them to reorganize. It's very unorganized. Other than that it's an awesome place for Adults who collect actions figures!

Reviews.Author: Aja
Reviews.Content: I cringe every time my kids ask me to take them in this store because it's such a mess! There are constantly boxes on the floor and too much merchandise on the shelves, its actually hard to shop.   This store is in need of some serious organization.

Reviews.Author: Chumo
Reviews.Content: Everything is over priced. Very low amount of exclusive pops. Don't come here If you are looking for good pops.

Reviews.Author: Melanie
Reviews.Content: Love this place. A little pricey but some good finds can be had here. Love it.

Reviews.Author: Kim
Reviews.Content: I love this shop. It's true that this is not your traditional toy store, but then again there are big box retailers for that. This is more of a treasure trove of cool stuff you might not find elsewhere. We bought some Minecraft toys for my daughter and a collectible Star Wars figure for my son (this one was impossible to find elsewhere). They're not the cheapest store, but they definitely have some outstanding items to explore. And, the staff here is super friendly and always willing to help you out. Definitely worth a visit.

Reviews.Author: Tonia
Reviews.Content: Their return policy states they can only refund unopened items.  My daughter bought a mini figure that was sealed in a box.  When she got home and opened it, it was broken.  Went back the same day to exchange it, the cashier called the manager....He said No, because it was opened he cannot do anything.  HOW COULD WE KNOW IT WAS BROKEN UNTIL WE OPENED IT? BUT IF IT'S OPENED, IT INVALIDATES THE RETURN POLICY!!                                                                                            Update:  The owner of the store responded to my review and not only did he exchange the broken mini figure, he apologized and  GAVE US ANOTHER ONE FOR FREE.  I couldn't be happier!!  Will not hesitate to shop here again!

Reviews.Author: Michelle
Reviews.Content: This is a great store. There's a TON of great stuff and the staff is very helpful and friendly. I went looking for a gift for my boyfriend and found exactly what I was looking for and for a great price.  The only downside to the store is how close it is to me! I'm not going to be able to stay away!

Reviews.Author: Nicole
Reviews.Content: I don't understand how this place gets so many stars. The store is very junky and cluttered. Many of the boxes and packaging are damaged. Prices are out of this world. You'll have much better luck going to Target.

Reviews.Author: Bryan
Reviews.Content: Love it here awesome staff always helpful whenever I go to summerlin mall I have to stop here its amazing

Reviews.Author: Teela
Reviews.Content: Store kinda unorganized and a cluttered mess. General idea was there, maybe they need more space. Prices seems to run moderately. A guy did walk by twice to ask if we were looking for anything. Pop wall kinda a hot mess, but not difficult to navigate. They do have the good stuff locked up and it wasn't hard to ask someone to open for pricing.

Reviews.Author: Kat
Reviews.Content: Awesome toys. Great and friendly service. Bought what my daughter will be surprised. Not bad on the prices but aren't toys now a days expensive?  Friendly workers and helpful. Stocked well. Parking is in front or all around. And they also have a parking lot.

Reviews.Author: Elaine
Reviews.Content: We come here every time we visited Vegas. My husband and I are big Funko Pop collectors and its very unsettling how much this place has marked up their prices on their pops. The average pop sale price is $10-$12 (depending on exclusivity). A lot of their inventory are older releases and those pops have lost value, but yet they are charging $15 or more for them. If you're looking to buy toys, this is a good place for your kids, but for FunkoPop collectors, go elsewhere.

Reviews.Author: Peter
Reviews.Content: I recently went into the shop, which I always go here with my 2 year old and always buy something. This time when I made the purchase I was given my change and I was given counterfeit money as change. When I asked for new bills I was accommodated but after I got home I found that another one of the bills I received was still counterfeit. I tried to contact the store numerous times and the manager never goes into the store. I never got a resolution to the problem of the fake $20 bills. I don't think I trust the store anymore since this fake $ was in their opening till.

Reviews.Author: Pablo
Reviews.Content: This place... ah!  I love it. Best store in that area. Wife goes for her shopping  I go for my toys.. she actually  enjoys it alot now too. This is awesome. Great place for gifts... wink wink.. there's something  for everyone..

Reviews.Author: Michael
Reviews.Content: Love this store! Has very cool/unique toys for the everyone! There are so many nerdy products that I will be back in to buy again and again. Their return policy is totally fare and prices are pretty fair!

Reviews.Author: Lo
Reviews.Content: Cool store as they have figures that are hard to get that you don't see at other stores and have friendly staff. Cons are that the store is a mess and at times they have merchandise just shoved in their cases that you can't see and prices are a little high but overall cool store.

Reviews.Author: Leslie
Reviews.Content: Most definitely coming back! Thank you Cheyenne for helping me out and finding the Kobe Bryant action figure I needed! You're awesome!

Reviews.Author: Stefany
Reviews.Content: They're not TOYS, they're ACTION FIGURES!!1!1 This place mostly seems geared toward adults- sports, series, and franchise action figures and collectibles dominate the selection. The POP brand of miniature stylized figures in particular is a bit overwhelming. The small square boxes are stacked up the wall, and if a kid has been grabbing his favorites the selection can be a bit hard to pick through- Buffy characters in with Disney villains, princesses mixed in with Supernatural, etc. Price range for the figures ranges from a reasonable $10-15 to other items going for $50+.  This is more a place I would look for a gift for a young adult than a child, but they do have puzzles, stuffed animals, and various games if you're here to pick up a birthday present for the littles in your life.

Reviews.Author: Cassandra
Reviews.Content: I needed to do some last minute shopping on Christmas Eve and was in search of Pokemon toys for my kid brother. The Toy Box was like a shining beacon and proved to be the solution to my procrastination. Not only did I find Pokemon toys, but they were on sale for 25% off! We grabbed some Pokemon cards tucked away behind the counter for $3.99 as well. The prices at The Toy Box seem fairly comparable to any major retailer. Even better is that this store offers a 15% off check-in offer!   Besides the trendy toy selection for kiddos, there was also an abundance of really cool collectibles and board games at The Toy Box. The Arnold Schwarzenegger and Predator action figures locked away in the glass cabinets were nifty, but packed a punch with the price tag of $200+. I enjoyed looking at their selection of Marvel toys, too. It's safe to say The Toy Box offers something for your average kid AND the serious collector.          I was more than happy to spend my money here rather than say, Walmart or Toys  R  Us. Come support your local toy store and check out The Toy Box.  YELP 100 CHALLENGE 2015: #271

Reviews.Author: Mike
Reviews.Content: Located in Downtown Summerlin, The Toy Box was very easy to find. It is actually located within a tenth of a mile of the MTO Cafe!  My friends and co-workers know that I enjoy (a) collecting Star Wars (b) collecting Hot Toys and (C) collecting Funko Pops!. I am a complete nerd/ dork/  whatever you want to call it  when it comes to my toy collections! So, needless to say, I have been hearing about this place for quite a while!  (+) very extensive variety of toys, both current and vintage! It was packed in there! I saw many toys I hadn't even seen or thought of since I was a kid in the 80's! You could really just walk around here and window shop and have a lot of fun with that! But I am weak and and had to buy a little something! (+) One of the few places in town that has Hot Toys! You will find them in the glass cases in the back corner! The details on these figures are amazing! Be warned though, they are not cheap! (+) A massive variety of the Pop!'s can be found here. It is  ton of fun to just wander around and see what particular ones they have that you have been unable to find elsewhere! I think half of the fun in collecting these things is in the hunt! Just trying to locate that last missing piece to a set! (+) Employees were so polite and friendly. The young lady that helped us get the Pop's we were looking for was awesome! Plus the gentleman at the front (who I suspect may be the owner (?)) was also very nice and helpful.  The only thing I will say, as it pertains to most collectibles, is do your homework. Some items were better priced than online and at other stores and some things were not. Just do your homework and make an informed purchase!  Spoiler Alert: There is about a 100% chance that I will be back here! This is an awesome store and I can't wait to come back for more!  5 stars.  Woohoo. As good as it gets!

Reviews.Author: Lydia
Reviews.Content: The staff is very nice and always offering to open up the glass cases if you want to look at anything in there. Honestly, the prices vary but you can go anywhere from 10-15$ up to a couple hundred for the limited edition collectables. This is a place for nerds, it has board games, collectable merchandise, and tons of random things I haven't really seen anywhere else around town.   The name  toy box  may throw some people off if they are expecting more like a toys r us type store but this a completely different specialty toy shop. Some of the things they carry are: doctor who, Star Trek (old and new stuff), Star Wars, mine craft, pokemon, marvel, dc, and a whole ton of board games.   If you are looking for a toy store that sells the same generic crap, don't go here. If, however, you're looking for something you probably haven't seen before then at least give this place a chance. If you're a nerd and proud of it, you won't be disappointed with this store!

Reviews.Author: Allison
Reviews.Content: First of all let me place a Disclosure in case you aren't  Following me on Yelp  I am a NERD! So I can get lost in these sort of shops for super long.. This store is a speciality toy shop that carries a variety of things but it is mainly collectibles . I am a huge Funko Pop Vinyl Addict so that is the reason I stopped into the Toy Box. It is really a large space and they have a variety of items to choose from. If you're a collector like I am of Pops this place is fun to check out and they have a huge selection but the prices are hiked up a bit because it's more of a Mom & Pop style place .  I was greeted by Francisco when I walked in and he came to the Pop wall and asked if I needed any help . Since I prefer to  Hunt  alone it was super nice not to be bothered but also having a chance to talk Pops with him was fun ...   I didn't end up finding anything I HAD to have this time around but I do plan to come back..   I can't give it five stars mainly because I don't care for the price tag placement on most of their pops . However I do see myself stopping in here anytime I am in the area..

Reviews.Author: Eric
Reviews.Content: My review has changed to 4 stars just because of the fact that Justin reached out to me about my 1st post. He seems like a guy really interested in what his customers think and a guy wanting the best for his business.  Thanks for reaching out justin and hopefully we will see you soon!

Reviews.Author: Ghia
Reviews.Content: Actual real-life toy stores are really hard to come by nowadays. When I was a kid, I always looked forward to going to my local KB Toys and browsing the aisles in all its chaos. The people of Summerlin are lucky enough to have this place conveniently located in Downtown Summerlin. The Toy Box fits the bill for toy fans of all ages - they have a great selection for those young in age and young at heart. Their prices are a bit higher than your big box retail stores, but there is a charm about the store and taking your kid (or husband) to buy something here after dinner or post ice-cream. They also have a great deal for Yelp Check Ins - 15% off one item per family, per day. They also play some type of old movie or TV show that can instantly take you back to a different time in your life. The store can be a bit of a mess and hectic at times, but we always enjoy a stroll in here when we're in the area.   PRO TIP: Huge Funky POP! selection

Reviews.Author: Chel
Reviews.Content: Excelente tienda con un gran servicio de los empleados definitivamente volver! Muchas gracias muy agradable experiencia

Reviews.Author: Brenda
Reviews.Content: Expensive for sure but there is a lot of great items in here. If you don't want to spend the dough don't even walk in here. I've found a great selection of Melissa and Doug items for my little girl and she loves the blind bag items which they don't seem to carry the cheaper ones anymore. It seems like most of the blind bag/fashems are $8.99 and I'm not willing to spend that on my 3 year old who may or may not lose it. There is a huge selection of Funko figurines so if you love those get them! Overall, service isn't bad. I've always had to look for someone to open the cabinet for me for the blind bag items but once we get that in our hands they check us out fairly quickly. My daughter loves coming here so every time we go to downtown summerlin we have to make a stop at the toy store.

Reviews.Author: Charlene
Reviews.Content: There are some hard to find toy figurines at this store that is decently priced. All of which are either locked behind glass or stacked high up on the shelves. If you have your heart set on a high ticketed item, you can try to negotiate the price down a bit with the owner. Doesn't hurt to ask!
